entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
